languages.text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

traits.locale_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

traits.locale_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

languages.text: 「何だと？ライカドの太陽が…我のせいで消えた？」
languages.original_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

traits.locale_text: 「何だと？ライカドの太陽が…我のせいで消えた？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “什么？莱卡德的恒星……消失了？因为我的错？”
languages.original_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

traits.locale_text: “什么？莱卡德的恒星……消失了？因为我的错？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Quoi ? Le soleil de Rykad... a disparu à cause de moi ? »
languages.original_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Le soleil de Rykad... a disparu à cause de moi ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué? ¿El sol de Rykad... se ha desvanecido por mi culpa?».
languages.original_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? ¿El sol de Rykad... se ha desvanecido por mi culpa?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Was? Rykads Sonne ... ist wegen mir erloschen?"
languages.original_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"

traits.locale_text: "Was? Rykads Sonne ... ist wegen mir erloschen?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ne? Rykad'ın güneşi... Benim yüzümden mi kayboldu?"
languages.original_text: "What? Rykad's sun... vanished because of me?"
